akn:subsection.akn:heading: Cooperative agreements and grants for establishing and supporting

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Cooperative agreements and grants for establishing and supporting

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Use of Federal payments under cooperative agreement or grant

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Use of Federal payments under cooperative agreement or grant

(c) Support period; additional periods Support of a center under subsection (a) may be for a period of not to exceed five years. Such period may be extended by the Director for additional periods of not more than five years each if the operations of such center have been reviewed by an appropriate technical and scientific peer review group established by the Director and if such group has recommended to the Director that such period should be extended.
